Package gameobjects.staticobjects

Class DestroyableStaticObject

java.lang.Object
gameobjects.GameObject
gameobjects.staticobjects.StaticObject
gameobjects.staticobjects.DestroyableStaticObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Poop, Rock
public class DestroyableStaticObject
extends StaticObject
A DestroyableStaticObject is a StaticObject that as the special ability of being destroyed by the players bomb.

It has a durability variable, that upon being equal to 0 will destroy the Object.

To check what the other variable from NonStaticObject are please refer to GameObject.

See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • DestroyableStaticObject

      public DestroyableStaticObject​(Vector2 position, Vector2 size, java.lang.String imagePath, Room room, int durability)
      Constructs a new DestroyableStaticObject, whose position and size are specified by the Vector2 argument, whose room is specified by the Room argument.

      This StaticObject is not a trap and will not inflict any damage to object when they collide with it.

      Parameters:
      position - the position of the new DestroyableStaticObject
      size - the size of the new DestroyableStaticObject
      imagePath - the image of the new DestroyableStaticObject
      room - the room the new DestroyableStaticObject will be in
      durability - the number of damage it will take the object to get destroyed

    • DestroyableStaticObject

      public DestroyableStaticObject​(Vector2 position, Vector2 size, java.lang.String imagePath, Room room, int damage, int durability)
      Constructs a new DestroyableStaticObject, whose position and size are specified by the Vector2 argument, whose room is specified by the Room argument.

      This StaticObject is a trap and will inflict any damage to object when they collide with it.

      Parameters:
      position - the position of the new DestroyableStaticObject
      size - the size of the new DestroyableStaticObject
      imagePath - the image of the new DestroyableStaticObject
      room - the room the new DestroyableStaticObject will be in
      damage - the damage the new DestroyableStaticObject will inflict to other objects upon collision
      durability - the number of damage it will take the object to get destroyed
